outline:
1. to penetrate, cut, attack, invade
    1. (Qal) to penetrate, cut into
    2. (Hithpoel)
      1. to cut oneself
      2. to gather in troops or crowds
kjv_def: assemble (selves by troops), gather (selves together, self in troops), cut selves.
strongs_def: to crowd; also to gash (as if by pressing into)
